---
title: 'Overriding individual code chunk options'
date: '2022-06-20'
code-fold: false
---

I've just moved this entire blog from `{blogdown}` to `{quarto}`. It was mostly simple but for one of the blogposts I really wanted a way to override individual code chunk options.

::: {.cell}

```{.yaml .cell-code}
---
output: html_document
---
  
```{r}
2+2
```

```
:::
